QueryResult.text: SELECT PRUID, PRID, PRCATEGORY, PRTYPECODEID, PRISOPEN, PRTRACKMODE, PRAVAILCURVE, PRCALENDARID, PRISROLE, PRUSERTEXT1, PRUSERTEXT2, PRUSERTEXT3, PRUSERTEXT4, PRUSERFLAG1, PRUSERFLAG2, PRUSERNUMBER1, PRUSERNUMBER2, PRPARENTID, PRJ_RESOURCES.LAST_UPDATED_BY PRMODBY, PRJ_RESOURCES.LAST_UPDATED_DATE PRMODTIME, PRPRIMARYROLEID, SRM_RESOURCES.UNIQUE_NAME AS prExternalID, SRM_RESOURCES.FULL_NAME AS prName, SRM_RESOURCES.DATE_OF_HIRE AS prDOH, SRM_RESOURCES.DATE_OF_TERMINATION AS prDOT, CMN_SEC_USERS.USER_NAME AS prUserName, SRM_RESOURCES.IS_ACTIVE, SRM_RESOURCES.RESOURCE_TYPE FROM SRM_RESOURCES, PRJ_RESOURCES, CMN_SEC_USERS WHERE SRM_RESOURCES.ID = PRJ_RESOURCES.prID and SRM_RESOURCES.USER_ID = CMN_SEC_USERS.ID (+)
